articles.title: Can anyone get infected with COVID-19 through currency notes? - The Siasat Daily
articles.description: Berlin: How long do coronaviruses remain infectious on banknotes and coins? Is it possible to become infected through contact with cash? Experts at the European Central Bank, in collaboration with the Department of Medical and Molecular Virology at Ruhr-Unive…

articles.author: Jason Groves, Shaun Wooller
articles.title: Summer holidays at risk as ministers threaten to put Spain, France and Italy on a new danger list - Daily Mail
articles.description: Plans for an 'amber watch list' have sparked uproar in Whitehall, with some ministers warning the scheme could wreck the hopes of millions of Britons to go to holiday hotspots in Europe this summer.
articles.content:
Families were in a fight to save summer last night with holiday hotspots in Europe facing new travel rules.
